title: (x) Mini Cooper corporate face - custom face by Dalton-Maag {Brown Fox}
content:
Which font used Mini Cooper ?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141005204005im_/http:/typophile.com/files/mini_cooper_font_5929.jpg)

cu  
formfollowsforce
author: formfollowsforce

comments.content:
Custom called Mini Thesis, I'm guessing by Luc(as) de Groot.

Something like TheSans would be close but there are some customised letters, e.g. M.
I know that Dalton Maag also made a custom made font for Mini. Maybe for the UK Market...

Brown Fox is right. Look at this...

[http://www.daltonmaag.com/browse/custom/clients/mini](http://web.archive.org/web/20141005204005/http:/www.daltonmaag.com/browse/custom/clients/mini "http://www.daltonmaag.com/browse/custom/clients/mini")

Not sure what Mini Thesis is but it's in the brochure pdfs.

Thanks! Anyone idea to find best alternative font for mini cooper, because the mini type regular is created exclusiv for mini. I find type "Maurea" from Primetype [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/primetype/maurea/bold-caps-lf/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141005204005/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/primetype/maurea/bold-caps-lf/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/primetype/maurea/bold-caps-lf/") is really good as alternative ?

cu  
formfollowsforce
